data.eml:eml: Four new symmachiine taxa from the eastern Andes of Peru and Ecuador (Lepidoptera: Riodinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hall, Jason P. W., Lamas, Gerardo (2007): Four new symmachiine taxa from the eastern Andes of Peru and Ecuador (Lepidoptera: Riodinidae). Zootaxa 1533: 41-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177751
